subject: Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A.’s attempt to recoup nearly $1.4 million in restitution from the disgraced referee Tim Donaghy is “a transparent attempt at witness intimidation,” his lawyer said Monday.
snippet: The N.B.A.’s attempt to recoup nearly $1.4 million in restitution from the disgraced referee Tim Donaghy is “a transparent attempt at witness intimidation,” his lawyer said Monday.
